_header: And his father of wife wit nought
Subjects: Agnes, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: The Life of St Agnes in the Scottish Legendary — in couplets

CULGg26.First Lines:
…& his fadire of wyf wat noghtna of sic delyt neuire
                    rocht…
CULGg26.Last Lines:
…one þe fyngire of þat ymagof vad of weding in to
                    vag
CULGg26.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Barbours des schottischen Nationaldichters Legendensammlung.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1881: 2.151-6.
Metcalfe,  William Musham,
                        ed.  
             Legends of the Saints, in the Scottish dialect of the fourteenth
                century….
             6 pts. in 3 vols. 
             Scottish Text Society
         13, 18, 23, 25, 35, 37. Edinburgh, London: Blackwood, 1896: 2.346-57.
